r.d: The Log framework provides an abstracted logging system. It supports logging to console, file, syslog, SQL, Sqlite, mail, and mcal targets. It also provides a subject - observer mechanism.
r.n: Provided documentation on logging PHP assertions and exceptions. All stock handlers now provide stubbed open() and close() method. The composite handler now tracks the success of its child handlers' operations. The composite handler's log() method now opens its child handlers if they're not already open.
